task.title: Run a ranked report
task.shortdesc: In a ranked report, the table shows the rankings of the report pages in relation to the metric, according to number or percentage. Ranked reports can display multiple metrics in a report.

step.cmd: Generate a report, such as a Pages Report (Site Content > Pages).
In the report header, click Ranked.
To rank the report, click a column heading in the table.

info.p: Ranked reports can have up to 200 items listed in the table (such as products, categories, web pages, and so on) and ten metrics (revenue, orders, views, and so on).
